text: Phira jihare loka imana li'a'e ate jinham ne cage kama kite tam unham nu alaha pura fala devega ate apani kirapa nala unham nu zi'ada vi devega. Ate jinham lokam ne trisakara kita ate hakara kita hove ga usanu daradanaka saza de'ga. Ate uha alaha di tulana vica na kise nu apana mitara dekhanage ate na saha'ika
